expected_output: We offer 30-day returns on all products with receipt or proof of purchase. Items must be in original condition.

input: How do I track my order?
expected_output: You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email after shipment. It typically takes 24-48 hours to activate.
Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International delivery typically takes 7-14 business days.

input: What payment methods do you accept?
expected_output: We accept credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.
